title: matched with unranked
body:
so i go on league today trying to climb in ranked currently at silver 3 but for two games in a row my teams are almost exclusively un-ranked players. both games i snowballed in lane but my whole team lose lane, and both ranked players had the support last pick. Jungle hec goes 0/10 including multiple executes after seeing the champion played in lcs. 0/8 Darius top gains 9 cs between the 20-30 minute marks, and the games were stagnant. 

TDlr: I CANT LEAD PEOPLE WHO DONT KNOW HOW TO PLAY THE GAME OR SPEAK IN CHAT, THIS ISN'T EVEN WHAT I SAW IN BRONZE

make matchmaking balanced, it's not healthy when the game is so often stomp or stomped.
/end

replies.body:
You are matched with players who have similar MMR to you.

>kek

but aside, if you'd like to be matched with people who aren't as disparately dispersed from you as it seems to be, play League in its peak times, like from 6 to 9.
